= Maven =

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.xmlmatchers</groupId>
  <artifactId>xml-matchers</artifactId>
  <version>0.10</version>
</dependency>
}}}


= Non-Maven =

Download the latest version from from the [http://code.google.com/p/xml-matchers/downloads/list download page].  

xml-matchers depends on [http://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/ Hamcrest]  (hamcrest-core) version [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hamcrest/hamcrest-core/1.2/hamcrest-core-1.2.jar 1.2]. If you are using the XML "equivalence" features, [http://xmlunit.sourceforge.net/ XML-Unit] version [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/xmlunit/xmlunit/1.3/xmlunit-1.3.jar 1.3] is also required.
